name: Quick and Easy Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip
author: Miranda Helme
summary: A spicy yet mild dip, this dish will be a crowd-pleaser at any occasion!
ingredients: ¾ cup hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot ®)
½ cup shredded pepper Jack cheese
4  fully cooked chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
⅓ cup shredded pepper Jack cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Beat cream cheese, hot sauce, 1/2 cup pepper Jack cheese, and blue cheese dressing together in a large bowl; fold in chicken until completely coated
Pour mixture into the prepared baking dish and top with crumbled blue cheese and 1/3 cup pepper Jack cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and dip is bubbling up the sides, 15 to 20 minutes
